column2: we got a 9" Malnati's Chicago Classic for delivery. We were told that it was going to take 1 hour to cook and delivery to us and it arrived exactly at the 1 hr marker so kudos to them for that. Even though it was delivered
column3: the pizza was still fantastic. The combination of the cheese
column4: tomato sauce sausage and the buttered dough complemented each other perfectly.
